desc: Hand-crafted and one-of-a-kind art, unique jewelry, engraved and layered awards and woodallions, personalized gifts, inlaid boxes with secret compartments, all locally made. Custom work with quick turnaround.

layout.text: Local artists and makers doing what we love, creating beautiful things. We create fun and functional art, big and small, using wood, acrylic, glass, stone, leather, denim and other interesting textiles. Made by us, here in the USA.
